thread.title: Christine Norodom
thread.title_full: Otticanet recensione scritta da Christine Norodom

author: Christine Norodom
title: Christine Norodom
text: My thought my order was taking a little long to get sent so I sent a message. They responded quickly to my inquiry and even still kept me informed with the status of my order afterwards. My only gripe is that I wish they wouldn't use FedEx. That company is notorious for lost packages and poor service.
